creator: mailto.elena.smirnova@gmail.com
text: The scroll bar in the Content field in JMS Point-to-Point sampler does not work. When the text in the Content field exceeds the window size, it's not possible to reach it.

creator: support@ubikloadpack.com
text:
Hello,
Already reported as 55999 and fixed in nightly build.
